workspace-management.title: Workspace Management - Nurl Sanctum Guide
workspace-management.description: Learn how to efficiently manage your workspaces in Nurl Sanctum. Create, switch, edit, and delete workspaces with ease.

managing-workspace-members.title: Managing Workspace Members - Nurl Sanctum Guide
managing-workspace-members.description: Discover how to manage team members in your Nurl Sanctum workspace. Add, remove, and edit member roles seamlessly.

repository-management.title: Repository Management - Nurl Sanctum Guide
repository-management.description: Learn how to create and manage repositories in Nurl Sanctum. Control visibility settings, edit repository details, and organize your game content effectively.

authentication.title: Authentication - Secure Access to Nurl Services
authentication.description: Understand Nurl's authentication process using one-time login tokens. Securely access all Nurl services with a single account.
